scripts:
set ACL for mysiteviewer
  allow jcr:read on /, /libs, /content/cq:tags/mysite, /content/dam/mysite, /conf/global/settings/dam
end

set ACL for mysiteadmin
  allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /content/cq:tags/mysite, /content/dam/mysite
end
create user mysiteviewer1 with password mysiteviewer1
create user mysiteadmin1 with password mysiteadmin1
